1.title: Soba of niigata: A flavor of craftsmanship
1.plot: Japanese food" attracting attention in the world. \ N In particular, I visit a famous Japanese noodle dish "Nippon noodles" in Niigata Prefecture.

2.title: Niigata, the Kingdom of Ramen!
2.plot: We will deliver the latest ramen information in Niigata prefecture, which is known for many delicious ramen shops throughout Japan.

imdb.plot outline: Where do you find the best noodles and sake Japan has to offer? Look no further than Niigata Prefecture, a region located on the island of Honshu along the coast of the Sea of Japan that also includes Sado Island. The area is one of the top producers of high-quality rice and boasts some of the best sake, ramen and soba noodles in all of Japan. The food-focused entertainment show "Delicious Niigata in Japan," which has been airing weekly in the Niigata Prefecture since 2011, helps you discover the region's best food and drinks.
imdb.title: Delicious Niigata in Japan
plot: Where do you find the best noodles and sake Japan has to offer? Look no further than Niigata Prefecture, a region located on the island of Honshu along the coast of the Sea of Japan that also includes Sado Island. The area is one of the top producers of high-quality rice and boasts some of the best sake, ramen and soba noodles in all of Japan. The food-focused entertainment show "_Delicious Niigata in Japan_ (qv)," which has been airing weekly in the Niigata Prefecture since 2011, helps you discover the region's best food and drinks.
